text:
Hello HubSpoters, Curious, how can I merge 3 contact properties into one and have the final value equal to
Property 1 + Property 2 + Property 3 = Property 4
All 4 properties are text properties. Thanks
with the new Data panel feature (<https://app.HubSpot.com/l/whats-new/betas>) you should be able to do just this when coupled with a Set property value action:
This is amazing , Thank you so much Zeke :slightly_smiling_face: I appreciate this
let me know how it works out for you
hi <@UHVJJUWFN> I tried and it updated it with an empty value
Can you confirm that those values are actually not empty on that contact?
yep I do I think I found the issue, the target property is single text, cloned one as a multi text and testing now
nope same issue with multi text. the Vehicle year make and model are available separately but did not set to the one property (target property I want to merge it to) <@UHVJJUWFN>

For anyone following along, the issue is if a user ungates themselves to the feature but not their entire portal. This feature will not work properly unless an entire portal is ungated. Unfortunately, for this reason, we've had to remove the ability for folks to self-opt in from their own portals. If anyone wants access please just send me a DM with your hub ID and I'll be glad to give the feature to your portal
